jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
A body falls down from the stairwell next to a group of people on the ground floor
Someone runs through the door space
One of the infected slams against the glass door from the other side
The little girl attacks the police officer
An infected lady jumps into the centre of the hallway
A hand bursts through some glass grabbing one of the men
The light on the camera turns on revealing an infected person
The attic door suddenly opens
The camera spins around in the attic where a boy’s face appears. [Video]
Ángela and Pablo try and sneak past an infected person however they make a noise and it turns around
Ángela screams as she is suddenly dragged away
Sick-Head suddenly appears underneath the door of the toilet cubicle that Charly is hiding in
Levon bursts into the toilet cubicle startling Charly
Sick-Head grabs Levon from behind
Sick-Head returns as Charly attempts to treat Levon
Sick-Head suddenly spasms as he lies on the floor
The lady tied to the mattress suddenly moves and cries out
A hand is placed over Venus’s mouth
Doom-Head appears behind Charly
A Facehugger jumps out of the egg and lands on Kane’s helmet
Dallas accidentally kicks something over, causing Ripley to cry out in surprise
The Facehugger drops onto Ripley’s shoulder
The Facehugger twitches as Ash pokes it
Blood spurts out of Kane’s chest and a few seconds later an alien bursts out of it
A cat hisses and runs away
The alien comes into view behind Brett
An alien appears in front of Dallas. [Video]
Ash grabs Parker
The cat jumps out at Ripley
An alien hand extends out in front of Ripley
The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her
Reagan is startled by a pack of birds hiding in the train
The body of a dead person falls against Reagan as she releases the first aid box from the train’s restroom
Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward
Emmett is startled by something as he attempts to unmoor the boat
An unknown girl startles Emmett
Marcus parts the curtain and discovers Emmett’s wife’s corpse
A creature leaps onto the convertible and rips open the soft top
A creature leaps onto the convertible AGAIN
A creature grabs a man and drags him out from under a garage door
A creature rips off the door
A creature rips the furnace door open as Evelyn tries to close and lock it
Beau is attacked by one of the creatures (while we get some warning the attack is quite loud and violent)
Regan knocks over a lamp during a game of monopoly and the ensuing loud noise during a previously quiet scene may be quite startling for some viewers
There is a loud bang on the roof of the house
As Lee listens by a window, a raccoon suddenly screeches and runs past
A raccoon is suddenly attacked by one of the creatures
As Regan is about to descend the stairs, Lee grabs her and pulls her back
Marcus walks past an old man who is watching him in the background
A creature walks past the doorway above the stairs
The creature makes a loud noise
Evelyn puts a bloodied hand on the shower window startling Lee
As Regan goes to pick up the torch, Marcus grabs her wrist
Marcus falls through a metal door and lands in the grain silo
The creature drops down into the grain silo beside Regan
After a period of silence we see the creature outside the car, the creature then breaks through the window with a loud crash

movies.title: Anacondas: The Hunt for Blood Orchid

jump_scares.spoiler: A monkey abruptly leaps onto Gail
A monkey leaps onto the table suddenly
Ben was pulled underwater by an anaconda
Ben was attacked by an anaconda
The corpse of Livingston popped in the shot
Tran falls into a hole underwater
An anaconda attacks Cole from the back
Bee gets scared by Greg climbing up the stairs
As Bee is looking around, David suddenly throws his body against the window behind her
After being woken up by Alice, Greg’s sudden move scares the group of girls
Sophie hugs Bee from behind
The dogs body opens up and blood sprays out
The boy grabs Paul’s hand and bites it
A truck suddenly drives by behind the boy
Bert accidentally discharges his rifle
A man appears in Bert’s line of fire
A man appears, accompanied by a loud sound cue
A bloodied man appears at the front door, pleading for help
Marcy screams as a hand touches her shoulder
The police officer suddenly turns around and points her gun
Marcy shoots at the dog
Karen, who is very sick, appears
A woman with a rifle appears
A man jumps out of the water
Jeff is shot in the head
An apparent earthquake causes the camera to shake violently
The monster’s tail slams into the bridge
The monster’s foot comes down in front of Rob
An air-conditioning unit falls off the building
A parasite drops down from the ceiling
The monster suddenly lunges at the helicopter
A bomb hits while Rob and Beth are hiding under the bridge causing debris to cover the camera
A dog bark startles Jenny as she sunbathes
As a joke Steve scares Jenny in the tent
A car horn blares during a suspenseful scene
A clown doll falls from the ceiling with a loud horn
A skeleton reaches through a break in the wall
The female skeleton slams into the chain fence nd starts screaming
A cartoon clown jumps on the screen right at the camera
A woman starts banging on the car door and screaming
During a quiet establishing shot of a stately room, a man suddenly falls through the roof
Danny suddenly falls through the ice
As Ben says “I have the antidote” he is suddenly tackled by Jason
As Zoe says “Ben, get up”, she is suddenly attacked by the Game-master
Loud gunfire can be heard coming from the bus in front
The soldier outside the bus is attacked by a zombie
The apparently dead soldier suddenly opens his eyes and attacks
A zombie breaks through the car window and attacks Emma
A creature leaps out at Patrick
While Patrick is lying in the snow, a creature stands over him and screeches
The chained up creature tries to attack Jack
Lu turns around and comes face to face with one of the creatures
A creature pops up at one of the boarded up windows
The creature suddenly snarls at Lu who is hiding behind some stairs
The creature jumps onto the table above Lu
The creatures start banging on the walls of the house
A wolf suddenly appears in front of Dan
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck
Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters
A warbling sound is heard as the lights in everyone’s rooms begin to flicker
Caroline becomes visible through her virtual background as she appears to fall towards the webcam, knocking the laptop over
Emma’s camera pans down and a floating face filter is seen
Emma’s cabinet doors burst open
Alan’s body falls to the floor behind Radina
Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head
Haley’s chair gets pulled away
A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view
Another mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view as loud screaming is heard
Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes
A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards
Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit

The opening scene involves the camera slowly zooming in on the trunk of a parked car while Christmas music plays. Suddenly, the trunk lock pops out and we see a woman’s eye and this is accompanied by a very loud sound effect. [Video]
Angela bumps into a security guard as she walks around a corner
As Angela enters the security office a dog barks at her
Angela trips over something on the floor
Angela looks at her phone and the light from it reveals Thomas standing right behind her. [Video]
The dog barks at Angela once more as she enters the office
As the lift opens, Angela sees Thomas watching her from behind a door
A dead body falls into the flooded lift
Angela sees the policeman on the security camera, she then turns around but Thomas is standing right behind her. [Video]
The dog jumps through a broken window into the car that Angela is hiding in
The apparently dead dog suddenly barks at Angela
Angela appears behind Thomas after he opens a locker door
Angela turns the car on and loud heavy metal music plays on the radio
A car smashes into Angela’s car
Angela suddenly stabs Thomas in the eye
Thomas grabs Angela around the ankle
A bloodied and mutilated hand reaches up out of the water
The dock collapses causing Sheriff Forester to fall into the water
A mutilated dead body suddenly pops up out of the water onto Sheriff Forester’s back
A fish embryo inside an egg suddenly starts moving
A Piranha suddenly bites the diver’s hand
Piranhas suddenly appear, chasing a girl in the water
The girl who was parasailing is lifted out of the water revealing her missing legs and mutilated body
A girl being carried out of the water, suddenly splits in two
A giant piranha suddenly jumps out of the water and over the boat, taking Novak with it
While running on the road, Peter is suddenly shot in the leg
A stuffed rabbit toy suddenly turns its head towards Heather
A knife suddenly impales Harry
There is a sudden scene change to a close-up of a pop tart popping out of a toaster
A homeless man’s face suddenly transforms into a disfigured eyeless head
A man startles Heather
Vincent appears behind Heather, startling her out of her hallucination
A figure crosses in front of Harry as he opens a door
A man turns around to reveal his eyes and mouth are sewn shut
A monster (The Missionary) drops down behind Douglas and attacks him
The Missionary appears once more and pulls Douglas away
There is a loud metallic clanking as a door opens
Heather has a dream of Alessa in Silent Hill
Alessa’s image briefly flashes across the screen
Vincent is grabbed by The Missionary
Heather is startled by one of the statues
The statue turns to Heather and opens its eyes
The spider-like creature attacks Heather
Heather shines her torch on a monster
Leonard rushes out of the darkness at Heather
A prisoner grabs at Heather through some bars. [Video]
The doors burst open as Vincent is wheeled in on a hospital bed
Heather looks to her left and sees a man in a gas mask beside her
The phone rings during a scene transition
Laura screams and falls back in her chair
The camera flashes to Laura on the ground with a loud soundtrack noise
Trevor speaks from offscreen and Rose drops her wine glass
The home security alarm goes off and Rose drops her glass
The phone rings suddenly
The phone rings suddenly again
Rose awakens abruptly from a nightmare
The demon abruptly screams at Rose during a tense scene
The camera cuts to a smiling partygoer standing very close to Rose with an accompanying sound effect
The demon screams Rose’s name and the scene abruptly changes
The scene cuts to a mangled cadaver
Holly’s head unnaturally drops from her shoulders and dangles in front of the car window
The demon grabs Rose’s face and proceeds to scream
The doctor knocks on Rose’s car window, startling her
The camera cuts back to the doctor who is now replaced by a smiling Carl with blood dripping from his mouth
Rose’s mother yells her name
The demon grabs the door that Rose is trying to close
The demon appears behind Rose and throws her against the wall
Joel begins running at Rose with an associated loud sound effect
Rose turns to see she is back at her childhood home
A bird flies out of the log
As Jenn looks around the creature places its feet in front of her
The rope tying the hammock to the tree slips off
The creature grabs the raft
The creature pierces through the raft
The creature grabs Jenn through the bottom of the raft and drags her down
Sarah runs into Beth at the hospital
A metal rod smashes through the window during one of Sarah’s dreams. [Video]
A large number of bats fly out in front of the girls
Juno jumps down in front of Sarah
Sarah turns around and Juno is right behind her
A crawler is seen standing behind the group through the night vision camera. [Video]
The girls run into a crawler that screams at them. [Video]
Sarah hallucinates her daughter, however when her head turns she becomes one of the creatures from the cave. [Video]
Holly’s body is dropped in front of Sarah, the creatures then proceed to eat the body
A crawler drops down from the roof in front of Rebecca. [Video]
Beth sticks her hand in the air and calls for Sarah
A baby crawler jumps on Sarah’s back
Sam sees a crawler moving along the cave roof
A crawler grabs Rebecca
Juno spots a crawler while underwater  it growls at Juno
Juno appears in the car beside Sarah. [Video](original ending)

movies.title: The Girl with All the Gifts

jump_scares.spoiler: The sound of a door opening may startle some viewers
A child suddenly lunges at the Sergeant
An infected child attacks Kieran
Lindsay opens he curtain to reveal Heiter standing there with a gun
During a tense scene Lindsay accidentally kicks a metallic object lying on the ground
Katsuro suddenly stabs Heiter in the foot
Kranz hears a loud gunshot coming from somewhere in the house
The gator swims past the screen
Lucky barks as Day reaches towards the gator’s mouth
A dog leaps out at Clark
Something moves past a doorway in front of Fuchs
Norris and Nauls attack MacReady from behind
Copper attempts to defibrillate Norris when a giant hole opens in Norris’s chest. [Video]
Palmer’s blood has a violent reaction when MacReady tests it with the copper wire
Blair appears behind Garry
The ground begins to erupt in front of MacReady
A zombie lunges at the camera
A zombie attacks a man in the toilet
A zombie bursts out of a toilet door and lunges at Columbus
A zombie appears in the back seat of the car that Columbus is driving
Columbus has a vision of a clown crawling under the toilet cubicle door
Columbus wakes up on the couch and turns around to see his neighbour has turned into a zombie. [Video
The zombie neighbour reaches for the door-handle
A mechanical figure pops out at Columbus in the haunted house attraction
A zombie attacks Columbus from behind. [Video
